exceptions.exn: In environment b, n : nat Hyp : b - 2 <> 0 Unable to unify "rem (alpha_nat ?M1480 ?M1481) ?M1485 = rem (alpha_nat ?M1480 n) ?M1485 \\/ rem (alpha_nat ?M1480 ?M1481 + alpha_nat ?M1480 n) ?M1485 = 0" with "rem (alpha_nat b n) (b - 2) = rem n (b - 2)".

original: intros Hyp. apply alpha_nat_2lm with (l := 1) (j := n). - lia. - simpl. rewrite Nat.sub_0_r. auto. - split. + simpl. lia. + left. simpl. apply Nat.sub_0_r.
